name: alpine
description: Alpine Linux with mixed date-based and semantic versioning

test_cases.notes: YYYYMMDD format should be parsed as date-based version
Semantic versions should be compared separately from date-based

edge_cases.issue: Mix of date-based and semantic versions
edge_cases.expected_behavior: These are different versioning schemes and should not be compared
edge_cases.notes: User should specify suffix or version pattern to disambiguate

edge_cases.expected_behavior: Treated as meta tag, not a version
